channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: Hadush Kebatu was found in the Finsbury Park area on London at 08:30 GMT on Sunday morning, two days after being let go by mistake from HMP Chelmsford. #MetPolice #MetropolitanPolice #London #HMPChelmsford #BBCNews
